name: Abbey Brewing Co
description: Miami Beach's world famous Abbey Brewing Company is home to award winning, hand crafted beers, friendly service, and a down to Earth atmosphere. One of the oldest bars in Miami, it has the old world charm of a traditional European pub

name: AleSmith Brewing Co
description: Forged in 1995, AleSmith is an artisan microbrewery that specializes in handcrafted ales in a variety of styles. Deeply rooted in the amateur and craft brewing communities, AleSmith ales have continued to garner national and international awards and acclaim, as well as a loyal and rabid following among beer enthusiasts.

name: Allagash Brewing Company
description: Allagash Brewing Company was founded by Rob Tod in 1995 as a one man operation dedicated to hand crafting the best Belgian inspired beers in the world. The first beer brewed was Allagash White, a spiced wheat beer and now our company flagship available in 17 states. We love beer, we love working with each other, we continually push the limits of beer and ourselves, and we grow as a profitable and sustainable company (and as individuals), without compromising our values or purpose. This passion has helped us push Allagash to the forefront of the growing Belgian beer category. We’ve won countless awards for our beer (11 medals including 4 gold since 2002 at The Great American Beer Festival & 10 medals including gold & silver in 2012 since 1998 at the bi-annual World Beer Cup), and received acclaim in the press (Gourmet, Bon Appetit, Men’s Journal, GQ, The Wall Street Journal and Saveur). But perhaps best of all, everyone in the Allagash family loves working here.

name: Arbor Brewing Company
description: Our love affair with beer began in 1991 with our first batch of homebrew. Eventually the brewing operation took over the kitchen and basement and we decided it was time to look for larger digs. So with the help of family and friends, we opened the ABC Brewpub a brewery and restaurant in Ann Arbor, Michigan in 1995.

name: Asheville Brewing Company
description:
A gem to the Asheville micro-brewing scene, Asheville Brewing creates it's own unique draw for the locals and visitors alike!! Along with our well known craft brews... SHIVA IPA, HOUDINI ESP, NINJA PORTER, ROCKET GIRL ALE, SCOTTISH BROWN, ROLANDS E.S.B, as well as limited addition Ales.... we also offer a full liqour bar at our Coxe Ave location, with daily drink specials!! 

We offer a full, fantastic food menu, including our "famous" pizza buffet during the week 11-3.

Our Coxe Ave location offers a "Beer Infuser Creation" every Thursday at 5:30!!

locations.name: North Asheville
locations.hoursOfOperation: Open 7 Days a week 11am until Midnight

locations.name: Downtown Asheville
locations.hoursOfOperation:
Monday - Thursday 11am until Midnight
Friday 11am until 2am
Saturday Noon until 2am, Sunday Noon until Midnight

name: Barley Creek Brewing Company
description: Located in Tannersville, right off route 80's exit 299 in between the Crossings Outlet Stores and Camelback Ski area (Camelbeach Water Park, Barley Creek is the Pocono Mountains' Original Brewpub and Restaurant, where you can always find great food, freshly brewed beer, a comfortable atmosphere, friendly people, and a unique place to kick back, relax and have a great time. Bring your friends, bring your family, bring your friends' families. We are open every day at 11:01am, and serve dinner till about 10pm. On Friday and Saturday we are serving dinner till about 11:00pm. The bar stays open a little longer (so you can finish your fun if you ordered food just before the kitchen closed) Cheers!

name: Barrel House Brewing Company
description: Established as a brewpub in 1995 in the historic Over-The-Rhine neighborhood of Cincinnati, The BarrelHouse Brewing Company has since transitioned into a regionally distributed microbrewery offering an impressive selection of both innovative styles of ales and traditional lagers. Brewed and bottled in small batches with only honest ingredients, BarrelHouse beers are extremely fresh and exceptionally flavorful. Thank you for embracing our fiercely independent vision of a hand-crafted future for all! Operating as a brewpub from August 1995 until February 2005, The BarrelHouse Brewing Company recently relocated to our current location in the West End of downtown Cincinnati. We officially reopened with a completed expansion plan in April 2005. Our expansion included almost doubling our fermentation capacity as well as the addition of a brand new bottling line. Our first order of bottled beer hit Ohio area stores in June 2006 and we have subsequently begun to enter markets that were previously unavailable. The BarrelHouse Brewing Company brews on a 15 BBL brewhouse manufactured by Century. One BBL equals 31 gallons therefore; our beers are hand-crafted in 465 gallon batches. Our ales are ready after approximately fourteen days while our lagers are conditioned for upwards of six weeks. By brewing in small batches, our brewers are able to achieve an optimal level of quality control while creating a consistently flavorful product. While our brewing process is quite labor intensive, we believe that hand-crafting our beers sets us apart from the majority of breweries in the U.S. today. Our dedication is unparalleled and quite evident in the final packaged product.

name: Barrington Brewery and Restaurant
description:
Welcome to the homepage of the Barrington Brewery & Restaurant. Our casual dining atmosphere is located at 420 Stockbridge Road (Route 7) in the Jenifer House Commons, Great Barrington, Massachusetts. We offer the freshest, handcrafted food and beer made right here.

Since 1995 the Barrington Brewery has been serving our own Barn Brewed Beer and food made from scratch and we were the first brewery on the east coast to install a solar panel system that supplies solar-heated hot water for brewing and restaurant use.

name: Battlefield Brewing Co
description: Fredericksburg’s first Brewpub - The Pub Restaurant Pub logo has been serving the area’s best food and drinks for 15 years. We offer some of the best food in Fredericksburg at prices that can’t be matched. Our ½ lb. burgers are the best in town and our secret spiced shrimp is enticing! With over 100 items on our menu you can’t go wrong. Kids menu and carry out available. We have a full service bar serving premium liquors and wine. We also have 16 beers on tap including 5 from our own microbrewery.

name: Bayhawk Ales
description: Bayhawk Ales, Orange County's largest microbrewery, began operation in late 1994 with our first beer being poured in February '95. We are a public corporation with over 1000 local and out of state stockholders. Bayhawk specializes in brewing House Beers for many fine restaurants and taverns throughout California, Arizona, Nevada, Oregon, and Washington. We just might be the Greatest Beer You Never Knew You Drank!

name: Bear Republic Brewing Company
description: Bear Republic's brews are hand-crafted using traditional brewing methods. We hand select only the choicest ingredients for each batch. The specialty grains and hops used by Bear Republic have been chosen for their unique characteristics. The recipes and their final formulations were developed over a period of several years. Those wonderful homebrewing sessions and the lessons learned from trial and error have established the solid foundations for each recipe's commercial equivalents. It's our goal to continually develop new recipes using our time tested home brewing methods. "I feel home brewing is the laboratory where true advancement of beer styles is coming from. "Richard G. Norgrove, Master Brewer.

locations.name: Bear Republic - Pub & Restaurant
locations.hoursOfOperation:
Mon - Thu: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm
Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 9:30 pm
Sun: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm

name: Bend Brewing Company
description:
Bend Brewing Company overlooks the Deschutes River at Mirror Pond in Bend, Oregon. Locally owned and operated, this exceptional brewpub opened its doors in February of 1995 and quickly became a favorite for locals and visitors alike. The people of the B.B.C. take pride in creative, award-winning handcrafted brews, fresh and flavorful menu selections, a casual and friendly atmosphere and superb service.

Bend Brewing Co. is a great place to have lunch, dinner or just some hot nachos and cold handcrafted beer after a day skiing or hiking in Central Oregon's recreational paradise.  In the summer, B.B.C.'s patio is the best place in town to dine outside. In the winter, come in and warm up with a malty seasonal ale.   Come and see for yourself why we're the locals' favorite!

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation:
Mon - Sat: 11:30 am - 11:00 pm
Sun: 11:30 am - 10:00 pm

name: Big Sky Brewing
description: Brewing Great Beer in the Northern Rockies Since 1995. We brew beers that we like to drink, and we hope you will enjoy them as well.

name: Blind Tiger Brewery & Restaurant
description:
We opened the first brewery in Topeka since the Prohibition era. 
It is named after the Prohibition era custom of displaying stuffed tigers in establishments to alert patrons of the availability of bootleg alcohol. These speakeasies were referred to as “Blind Tigers.”   We keep at least six flagships and seven rotating seasonals on tap, to the tune of about 1200 barrels a year. Our brews have gathered 20 national and international awards over the past 14 years.  Our Brewpub is located at 37th & South Kansas Avenue.

name: Blue Moon Brewing Company
description: Launched in 1995, Blue Moon Brewing Co. is a part of Tenth and Blake Beer Company, the craft and import division of Chicago-based MillerCoors. Known for it's Belgian White beer, the portfolio also includes seasonal variants, the Expressionist collection, the Graffiti series of more intense styles and the Vintage series of beer enhanced with the juice of wine grapes.

name: Blue Ridge Brewing Company
description:
Blue Ridge Brewing Co. is an established restaurant and brewery, offering 15 years of experience brewing only the finest of home brews and cooking an extraordinary array of unique dishes. Please, stop on by!

Born in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, Greenville's Brew-Pub continues to pay homage to one simple creed, to provide our customers the very best we can! We're as proud of Chef Rich's House-Made Menu as we are of Jay's Freshly Crafted Brews!

name: Boundary Bay Brewery
description:
The Boundary Bay approach to beer is to render excellent examples of classic styles. In some cases--such as with our IPA, Imperial IPA and Imperial Oatmeal Stout--we push the envelope and make a very big and flavorful brew. Put simply, we brew the beers that we like to drink! 

We are located in the heart of downtown Bellingham, WA and have been dubbed "Pure Bellingham" by the locals!  We continually win awards for our beer, have been named one of the top 25 breweries in the U.S. (by Steve Johnson, America's Best Brews), were declared the Best Brewery in WA (by the Northwest Brewing News Reader's Poll 2005, 2008, 2009 and 2010) and are the only brewery in Washington to bring home the Alpha King award for our Imperial IPA.

Come have a pint with us.  Cheers!

name: Bray's Brewpub And Eatery
description: In a Victorian farmhouse, in the heart of the Lakes Region of Maine, Bray's Brew Pub & Eatery has been serving up the best food and hand-crafted ales in Naples since 1995.

name: Captain Lawrence Brewing Company
description: Captain Lawrence beers are craft brewed in Pleasantville New York. We offer tastings and tours on Fridays from 4pm to 7pm, and Saturdays from 12pm  6pm.

name: Carolina Brewery
description:
Carolina Brewery is a locally-owned brewery and restaurant that has drawn international attention for its handcrafted beers, Our award-winning signature beers include Flagship IPA (Gold Medal, Great American Beer Festival), Copperline Amber Ale (Gold Medal, World Beer Championships), Sky Blue Golden Ale (Silver Medal, World Beer Championships), and Oatmeal Porter. We also offer a rotating list of seasonal brews. Our beers are now available on tap and in growlers and cans throughout North Carolina, so ask for them by name at your favorite bar, restaurant, or grocery store!

At our brewpubs in Chapel Hill and Pittsboro NC, you’ll discover authentic tastes in the glass and on the plate, a casual yet upscale atmosphere and affordable prices. Whether you’re looking for a place to grab a fresh beer with friends, enjoy a delicious meal, or host your next party, you’ve come to the right place. Carolina Brewery has been voted Best Brewpub in the Southeast by Brewpub magazine, and Best Burger in the Triangle by Independent Magazine and the readers of The Daily Tar Heel. But above all, we value the opinions of our customers, who cast their vote every time they return to our restaurant. We hope to see you soon. Cheers!

Proudly owned and operated by UNC alumni!

name: Carolina Brewing Company
description:
"Brewers of Tasty Liquids"

If you request a porter, do you expect someone to carry your bags?
If you were approached by a man carrying a dopplebock, would you run for your life? 

You shouldn't 

These are just two examples of the more than twenty styles of beer that were commonly available in the United States at the turn of the century. Prohibition and industrialization brought an end to this variety of beer, but now the Carolina Brewing Company is helping to revive these traditional brewing styles.

Unlike some fine wines that get better with age, beer is at its peak when it leaves the brewery. All of our beer is produced in small batches for local distribution to ensure that you get the freshest beer possible.

Purity is one of our top priorities. We use only four ingredients in our beer, malted barley, hops, yeast and water. Our beer does not contain chemicals or additives of any kind and it is not pasteurized.

Our method of brewing is time consuming and our choice of ingredients is expensive. We know it's worth the extra effort and cost, and we think you'll agree. Try our tasty liquids and we know that you will taste the quality.

name: Cerveja Colorado
description:
Founded in 1995, Colorado Brewery is proud to keep alive while renovating the old brewing tradition of the city of Ribeirão Preto. In our factory the touch of the master brewer and rigorous selection of the best raw materials combine to provide lovers of good beer a rewarding and unique experience. 

Our factory has modern equipment Brazilian Americans, and Canadians. 

All water used in the manufacture of beer and Chope Colorado is abstracted from the aquifer Guarany, one of the world's largest and most pristine freshwater reserves.

name: Chelsea Brewing Company
description: Chelsea Brewing Company, rated the best brewery in New York, is a first class waterfront restaurant and the only micro-brewery in Manhattan located at pier 59.With over 15 years of experience, and 8 National Awards, we are proud to serve up to 27 natural hand-crafted ales and specialty beers using only the finest malts and hops from around the world. We offer beer tastings, brewery tours and group packages.

name: Colorado Brewery
description: Founded in 1995, Colorado Brewery prides itself on keeping alive while renewing the ancient tradition of brewing beer in the city of Ribeirão Preto.

name: Cooper's Cave Ale Company
description:
We'd been brewing up beer in the kitchen at home for a few years. In 1995, we were informed that Ed's corporate employer of eleven years was leaving the area (NAFTA). Not wanting to move, and having had enough of the corporate world, we decided to do some research and see what was out there. At that time there were no breweries, brew pubs or microbreweries in our area. A two week vacation to Nova Scotia was inspirational.

It was the comradery of the brewers, owners and staff members that really sold us on the idea of opening our own establishment.The Micro Brewery people we've met have been generous beyond our wildest expectations, with information, how-to, where to find it, etc.

name: Dogfish Head Craft Brewery
description: Dogfish Head Craft Brewery makes off-centered ales for off-centered people.  Since 1995, Dogfish has brewed with nonstandard ingredients such as raisins, chicory, maple syrup, and grapes, changing the way people think about beer.  Dogfish believes beer can have as much flavor, complexity, diversity, food-compatibility and ageability as the world's finest wines.  To discover your favorite off-centered ale, visit www.dogfish.com

locations.name: Dogfish Head Brewings & Eats
locations.hoursOfOperation: Open 7 Days, Year Round! Open at noon for LUNCH everyday, & we serve DINNER every night!

name: Eel River Brewing
description:
Once an old lumber mill, we brew in our  brewing facility in Scotia, California. 

Our tap room and grill in Fortuna, California offers all of our beers as well as an extensive menu featuring local and organic products. Check out the "Pub Specials" tab for information on daily specials at our pub.

locations.name: Taproom & Grill
locations.hoursOfOperation:

7 days a week

locations.name: Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation:
While we do provide brewery tours, please call in advance to schedule an appointment. 

Tastings are at the Taproom & Grill Location

name: Ellicottville Brewing Company
description:
To date, EBC is considered one of the finest craft brewers and has received no less than THREE International World Beer Championship Awards.

The Ellicottville Brewing Company is the result of the desire to open a family business. Inspiration struck during a ski trip to Vail, where other craft brewers began. There was the realization that Ellicottville, sometimes referred to as "the Aspen of the East", would be the perfect location for a craft brewery & grill.

After 10 years of building a successfull brewery & restaurant in Ellicottville, our team ventured to open a second location where we could build on our brewing & culinary talents. EBC West opened June 1st, 2005 in the fun-filled college town of Fredonia, home to SUNY Fredonia.

name: Elysian Brewing Company
description: The Elysian was founded in 1995 by principals Dick Cantwell (President/Head Brewer), Joe Bisacca (CFO/Head of Operations) and David Buhler (Sales & Marketing Director). Our first Seattle location, a 220-seat beer hall and our main brewery, opened in 1996 on Capitol Hill, Seattle’s most populous neighborhood. In 1997 Elysian was chosen to operate a pub and small brewery at Gameworks—a large entertainment complex owned by Universal Studios, Dreamworks & Sega. Elysian left this partnership in 2002 upon expiration of the five-year contract. A short year later Elysian opened TangleTown, an 80-seat neighborhood brewery/bistro. With a 3-bbl pilot brewery, Elysian-TangleTown acted as the brewers' test kitchen, fueling the creative fires and helping cement Elysian's reputation as Seattle’s top brewpub. The most recent addition to the Elysian empire, Elysian Fields, opened in August 2006. Perched next to Seattle’s two sports arenas, Fields seats 400 and packs the house at lunch and on gamedays. It is typical for us to offer over twenty different Elysian beers between the three locations.

locations.name: TangleTown
locations.hoursOfOperation:
M-F: Opens 11:30AM
Sat:  11AM - 11PM
Sun. 11AM - 10PM

name: Fitger's Brewhouse
description:
Fitger's Brewhouse is located in the ancient Fitger's Brewery, in Duluth. We serve our own award winning hand-crafted ales and lagers brewed on premise by Fitger's Brewhouse Master Brewers. North Shore style ales and lagers, brewed with fresh Lake Superior water.

Fitger’s Brewhouse opened in 1995, after its founders took a western-states ski trip and came back inspired by that region’s brewing scene. Combining the relaxed ambience of a high-mountain brewery with uncompromising dedication to quality, Fitger’s Brewhouse established a tradition of handcrafted beer, fantastic food and excellent entertainment on Lake Superior’s North Shore.

In 2012 Fitger's Brewhouse won a bronze at the Great American Beer Festival for their Fitger’s Framboise. In 2013 they have received multiple honors including “Best Reason to Save the Growler” by the Minneapolis Star Tribune, “Best of the Lake” by Lake Superior Magazine, and “Best Brew” by Duluth Superior Magazine.

This year Fitger's Brewhouse will produce more than 80 styles and nearly 3000 barrels of handcrafted beer. Our stage hosts eclectic local and touring entertainers six nights a week.

Sun: 11:00 am - 12:00 am

name: Flying Fish Brewing Company
description:
When Gene Muller founded Flying Fish Brewing Co. in 1995, he did so first on the World Wide Web - making it the world's first virtual microbrewery. That early Web site helped generate positive press coverage and helped attract the investors needed to make the virtual brewery a real one. Muller said the idea was to make the Web site “This Old House meets the World Wide Web”—letting people go behind the taps and see the thousands of details needed to put a microbrewery together.

He also wanted to give beer lovers a chance, via their computers, to roll up their cyber-sleeves and help build the brewery. The site let beer lovers help select and name beers, design t-shirts and labels, volunteer to be a taste-tester and even apply for a job as a brewer. Visitors to the Web site can sign up for FlyingFishMail a monthly e-mail newsletter which now boasts more than 12,000 subscribers.

Muller, who got into the brewing field to become a brewer, trained at Chicago's Siebel Institute of Technology, America's oldest brewing school. He quickly realized someone was going to have to run the day-to-day business of the brewery and now serves as President and Head Janitor (though not necessarily in that order).

Flying Fish Brewing Company is located in Cherry Hill, New Jersey, approximately seven miles east of Philadelphia. In a state that once boasted 50 breweries, it is the first microbrewery in Southern New Jersey and the first new brewery built in that part of the state in more than half a century. From its opening in late 1996, Flying Fish has tripled its capacity and become the largest of the approximately 20 craft breweries in the state.

name: Freedom Brewery
description:
Established in 1995, Freedom Brewery is a pioneer of premium craft lager brewing in the UK. Now one of the leading brewery’s in this sector, Freedom’s range of beers have won over 25 International and National awards in the last 4 years alone.

All Freedom Beer is bottom fermented in closed, pressurized vessels. Lager is fermented at a lower temperature than ale and therefore takes longer – between 7 to 14 days, in contrast to 4 to 5 days. During fermentation, the beer naturally carbonates itself as a result of the breakdown of sugars to alcohol.

After the fermentation stage, the ‘young’ beer is transferred to maturation or storage tanks, where it’s stored at -1 ̊C. Freedom Brewery has a minimum maturation period of 4 weeks; this improves both the beer’s flavour profiles and naturally increases its stability, removing the need for chemical intervention. The verb ‘Lagerun’ is German for ‘to store’ – ironic as the majority of mass produced ‘lagers’ are brewed within days, with little or no maturation time at all.

Freedom Brewery sterile triple filters its beers to remove any remaining yeast and protein cells. This is instead of pasteurisation which, whilst being a cheaper process, carries the risk of ruining the beer’s natural flavours. Freedom’s first sterile filtration uses diatomaceous earth in contrast to isinglass, which is a substance obtained from the swim bladders of fish. As a result, all Freedom Beers are certified by the Vegan Society.

name: Front Street Brewery
description:
Located in Historic Downtown, the Front Street Brewery is Wilmington’s only Restaurant with its own Brewery. Our staff takes pride in offering fresh modern American cuisine, ranging from gourmet burgers to fine entrees and everything in between, at a reasonable price.

Front Street Brewery focuses on traditional beers as well as stretching the limits from time to time with various oak aged beers, sours and experimental styles throughout the year.

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation: Open daily for lunch, dinner and late night.

name: Goose Island Beer Company
description:
When the first Goose Island Brewpub opened its doors in 1988, domestic, mass-produced beer was deeply ingrained in Midwestern culture. The craft beer industry was still in its infancy, with only a handful of brewpubs in existence in the Midwest. In his travels across Europe, beer-lover John Hall had enjoyed a distinctive local brew in each region he visited. Hall was convinced that Midwesterners could produce beers as good or better than those he’d tasted in his travels. Living on the shore of the largest system of fresh water on the planet Earth, in a city with rapidly evolving tastes – John decided that his hometown, Chicago, would be the ideal place to do just that.

The key to building interest in craft beer, Hall decided, was to allow consumers to watch the brewing process – while providing them with the then-novel experience of enjoying a wide variety of distinctive beers that had been produced on-site. Hall wanted to not only cater to his customers’ tastes, but to challenge them as well. Goose Island’s brewers set to work crafting a diverse selection of unique beers – and on Friday, May 13, 1988 the Goose Island Brewpub was born.

It turned out that John was right; Chicagoans palates evolved rapidly once Goose Island’s Brewpub opened its doors and introduced the city to distinctive craft beer. By 1995, the brewpub had become so popular that John Hall decided to open a larger brewery and bottling plant to keep up with demand. Finding still more room for growth, in 1999 Hall opened a second Goose Island Brewpub just a stone’s throw away from historic Wrigley Field.

Today, Goose Island continues to brew an innovative selection of over 50 craft beers at the brewpub, the best of which are then bottled at our Fulton Street brewery. Goose Island beers are now enjoyed in all 50 states and Europe.

name: Heartland Brewery
description: Founded in 1995, Heartland Brewery is a NYC-based restaurant group with 7 locations, all with their own distinct identities. What they share in common is our award-winning locally brewed beer and a commitment to great food and warm, friendly service.

name: Heavy Seas Beer
description:
Heavy Seas Beer is brewed by Clipper City Brewing Company, in Baltimore, Maryland. The brewery was established by Hugh Sisson in 1995. Previously, Sisson operated Maryland's first brewpub, Sisson's. The brewery is named for the famed Clipper ship - first developed and built in the home port of Baltimore. While the name of the company remains Clipper City Brewing Company, all of its beer falls under the Heavy Seas brand. Heavy Seas is located at 4615 Hollins Ferry Road, Suite B, in the Halethorpe section of Baltimore. Heavy Seas currently offers a variety of beer styles in approx. 18 states within the United States.

Heavy Seas mission is to bring back the local brewery, and to do it in such a way that we are more than just a fringe player, but a positive part of our area. To accomplish this mission we have created a broad portfolio of products with enough diversity that we have at least one beer that can appeal to everyone. Whether your preference is for a classic American style lager beer, or a big, challenging Hop Cubed Ale, we have a something that will suit your taste. We believe in bringing beer drinkers the quality and flavor of a handcrafted beer while supporting the local communities we serve.

name: Hinterland Brewery
description: Hinterland is a small artisinal brewery devoted to brewing world class beer. Founded in 1995, by Bill & Michelle Tressler, Hinterland makes it's home in a turn of the century meat packing warehouse. Our award-winning beer can be found throughout Wisconsin's finest restaurants, taverns, grocery stores or anywhere craft beer is sold.In addition, Hinterland beer is served at our restaurant attached to the brewery in Green Bay as well as Hinterland Erie Street Gastropub in Milwaukee's Third Ward District and at our affiliated restaurant The Whistling Swan Inn & Restaurant in Fish Creek, WI.

name: Hyde Park Brewing Company
description: Hyde Park Brewing Company

name: Indian Wells Brewing Company
description: Proudly producing fine ales & lagers since 1995. One of California's favorite microbreweries!

name: Kona Brewing Company
description: Kona Brewing Company was started by father and son team Cameron Healy and Spoon Khalsa. The pair had a dream to create fresh, local island brews made with spirit, passion and quality. Their love of Hawaii, and a desire to protect the pristine environment here, brought them to the Big Island to fulfill their vision. Kona Brewing continues to be headquartered right where it began, in Kailua-Kona on Hawaii's Big Island.

name: Lewis & Clark Brewing Company
description: The great explorers are the inspiration for our breweries name and in many ways our brewing style. It's also where we live as we are located in the heart of the only Lewis & Clark County in the US. Our secret ingredient is the pride and craftsmanship added by dedicated people lucky enough to be called Montanans. Since our beginning, we have gone to the greatest of lengths to build one of the most efficient, sophisticated breweries around with one goal in mind: to produce the finest ales and lagers possible and serve them at their peak of freshness.

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation: Mon - Sun: 2:00 pm - 8:00 pm

name: Maumee Bay Brewing Company
description:
Established in 1995, the Maumee Bay Brewing Company brews and operates out of the historical Oliver House. Located at the corner of Broadway and Ottawa Streets it is the oldest working commercial building in Toledo. Our Brew Masters bring excellence in brewing and culinary experience to our craft beers. We transfer the same strength, creativeness, size, uniqueness and complexity of the architecture of the Oliver House to the artistry of our craft beer. No other brewery in the country brews under such history. With additional holding tanks and a bottling line located directly across the street at 28 Broadway, MBBCo's process requires great attention to detail and is very labor intensive. This delicate care sets our final product apart from other mass-produced brewing competitors.

Throughout the year we have 7 beers on tap at the Maumee Bay Brew Pub, including the historical Buckeye Beer. Additionally, our beers are available at all of the restaurants in the historic Oliver House. Come enjoy our craft beer paired with Toledo's best steak at Rockwell's or enjoy a pint with a pizza baked in our wood oven at the Pub. Enjoy a brewer's sample and some classic gaming at Mutz. It's simply a great place to be - in a whole lot of old and new ways! Our beer is also available for sale in half-gallon growlers "to go." We have twelve packs and kegs of Buckeye Beer available, plus kegs of select craft beers like Oktoberfest and Blitzen Ale seasonally.

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation:
Monday – Thursday 3p.m. - 10p.m.
Friday and Saturdays 3p.m.- 11p.m.

name: McKenzie Brewing Company
description:
All of our beers are brewed in very small batches so they are always fresh and at their peak. Our brewers consistently bring home awards from the Great American Beer Festival, 24 medals so far. Our award-winning beers are brewed at all three locations, where our brewers strive to push the creative envelope.  Our beer selection is both consistent, with four flagship brands, and fresh with new offerings of seasonal and dark beers.

Unfortunately we can not go under the Steelhead name due to Trademark issues so we will be McKenzie Brewing Company.

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation: Open daily at 11:30am

name: Middle Ages Brewing Company
description: Step back in time to when men were men, women were brewsters, and hand-crafted fine ale filled every flagon. Your quest for great taste leads you out of the past and into Middle Ages Brewing Company where we are sworn to uphold the tradition of brewing beer in small batches. Taste the difference hand-crafting makes.

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation:
Mon - Fri: 11:30am - 6:00pm
Sat: 11:30am - 5:00pm
Sun: 12:00pm 5:00pm

name: Moylan's Brewing Company
description: Moylan’s Brewery & Restaurant, Novato’s only brewpub, was $3.5 million project that has established a strong following among North Marin’s beer connoisseurs. Moylan’s features a 57 foot long bar, a dart room with a fireplace and a reading library featuring brewing books and magazines from Brendan’s personal collection. By constructing the brewpub in an empty lot from his own vision, Moylan was able to increase efficiency and productivity, while still leaving room for expansion as the establishment’s popularity grows. According to Moylan, the location at Rowland Plaza provides good freeway visibility and helps attract a greater number of customers from the nearby theatre and corporate offices. When Moylan co-founded Marin Brewing Company back in 1989 there were only about a 100 brewpubs across the country. Today, there are more than 2000.

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation:
Open Daily: 11:30-12:00 AM
Friday: 11:30- 1:00 AM

name: Nelson Brewery
description:
The brewery was first brought to the Historic Dockyard at Chatham as the Flagship Brewery in 1995 where it established a five barrel kit brewing up to 100 firkins a week. All the ales have nautical themed names to gel with the surroundings in which it is brewed


In 2003 the brewery was bought and renamed the Nelson Brewing Company to fall in line with the most famous naval hero of all time 'Admiral Horatio Nelson' and that his flagship 'The Victory' was built here in Chatham Dockyard.

In July 2006 the brewery was purchased by Piers Macdonald. Piers has over 20 years experience in the brewing industry and is passionate to keep the traditions of Kent brewing alive. Using the best ingredients and the finest Kent hops, combined with the expertise and dedication of his brewing staff, Piers plans to build on the brewery's already growing reputation as the provider of some of the tastiest ales on the market.

Now brewing from a seven and a half barrel kit and regularly having over a dozen ales of various strengths and taste available, the brewery is sure to have a beer to suit all!

name: Newport Beach Brewing Company
description:
At the end of 1992, the idea of the second brewery in Orange County was born. After six months of searching for the perfect location we found the old Delaney's Seafood Market building in the historic Cannery Village on the Balboa Peninsula, which would become our home.

Two years later construction was complete and on April 1, 1995 the Newport Beach Brewing Company became the first and only Brewery to open in Newport Beach and the 2nd Brewery to open its doors to the public in Orange County. Under the same ownership since day one we strive to serve fresh high quality food, cocktails and hand crafted beer at intelligent prices.

name: O'Connor Brewing Company
description: O'Connor Brewing Company brews all of our handcrafted ales on a 4 vessel 30 barrel Brewhouse. Each beer is brewed into three 30 barrel, four 60 barrel, and four 90 barrel Fermenters where the yeast takes over and creates one of our delicious libations. From there, we filter to remove all loose sediment into one of our three 30, 60 or 90 barrel Brite Beer Tanks. This is where our beers are conditioned, carbonated, and ready to package. We currently only offer our products in draft and bottles.  We have an onsite Tasting Facility that allows you to enjoy our brands and take beer home in Growlers!

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation: Our hours of operation are from 9:00 to 5:00 M-F.

name: Peg's Cantina and Brew Pub
description: Peg and Tony met at the University of South Florida as newly hired Ph.D.'s in Political Science in 1995. Earning their degrees in Iowa and Nebraska, respectively, the pair fell in love with each other and with Florida. The warm sunshine and beautiful water had a powerful effect on them. In early 2000, they both took jobs in Potsdam, New York at a small liberal arts college where they earned tenure in 2003. But the lure of the water and the sun was too much for the academic life and they both resigned, moved to Gulfport and opened their first restaurant.

name: Routh Street Brewery and Grille
description: (No longer brewing)

name: Royal Oak Brewery
description:
The Royal Oak Brewery opened in 1995 in trendy downtown Royal Oak, Michigan. Located one block east of Main Street, it has become an area institution. The comfortable atmosphere and hometown feel make it a destination for locals and visitors alike. The brewery serves 6-7 fresh beers on tap daily.

The Royal Oak Brewery brews our award winning ales and lagers on a 14 Barrel Specific Mechanical system. The brewing system was custom fabricated to fit precisely behind our large bar where our guests can interact with our brewer, Tim Selewski, and enjoy a pint at the same time. With the design of our brewhouse and our state-of-the-art beer delivery system, the Royal Oak Brewery can offer up to 7 house beers on tap at any time. To continue to produce the best possible product, we use only the 4 basic ingredients in our beer: water, malt, hops and yeast. We purchase the highest quality ingredients from around the world to produce the freshest and finest beers available in Oakland County. For more information about our brewery or to setup a tour, please contact our brewmaster, Tim, at the Royal Oak Brewery.

name: Sackets Harbor Brewing Company
description: Since 1995 Sackets Harbor Brewing Company operates one of New York State’s oldest continuing microbreweries featuring both a working brewery and dining establishment situated on the shore of Lake Ontario.

name: Sheepscot Valley Brewing Company
description: Steve Gorrill, the "Count of Whitefield" - Owner and Brewer, homebrewed for ten years prior to establishing the microbrewery in April of 1995. Specializing in unique beer styles, the flagship brew is Pemaquid Ale, a full-bodied Scottish ale (O.G.. 1.052) with a hoppy finish (great with hearty food).

name: Ship Inn Brewpub
description: On January 3rd, 1995, The Ship Inn was proud to become the first brewpub in New Jersey to brew beer since prohibition. Nestled in the scenic Delaware valley, The Ship Inn provides a comfortable pub atmosphere to enjoy the British inspired foods with locally sourced and ecologically responsible ingredients, and craft-brewed ales. The Ship Inn building

name: Ska Brewing Company
description: Characters Brewing Beer With Character Since 1995

Mon - Fri: 9:00 am - 8:00 pm
Sat: 11:00 am - 7:00 pm

name: Sly Fox Brewing Company
description: A full production brewery and accompanying restaurant opened in 2004 by the owners of Sly Fox Brewhouse & Eatery in nearby Phoenixville. The 20bbl brewhouse packages a wide range of beers in 12oz cans, 22oz bottles and 750ml bottles. Pikeland Pils, a multiple GABF Gold Medal Winner, and O'Reilly's Stout, a nitro-poured, draught-only beer named after brewer Brian O'Reilly's grandfather are among its most popular beers, on and off premises, as are such Belgian-style delights as Incubus Tripel, Ichor Quadrupel, Saison Vos & Black Raspberry Reserve. Sly Fox is also noted for its Bock Beers (see listing for the Phoenixville pub for more details) and annual Christmas Ale.

name: Snowshoe Brewing Company
description:
Snowshoe Brewing Co. was founded in early 1995, with a mission to brew great beer and create a diverse menu of good food. Our brewpub & restaurant was opened in Arnold, Calaveras County, in the former location of The Meadowmont Inn, overlooking the golf course. 

Our brewers have created award-winning ales that have ale lovers throughout Central California and the Sierras asking for a Snowshoe at their favorite pubs and restaurants. The staff at our restaurant wants to ensure that your meal is enjoyable… served with our Snowshoe hospitality!

The beer is bottled in Calaveras and brewed using a 15-barrel brewhouse, three 15-barrel fermenters and three 30-barrel fermenters. Our specialty beers include India Pale Ale, Westridge Winter Ale, Cutthroat Strong Ale, Oktoberfest, Irish Red, Porter, Midnight Moon Oatmeal Stout.

name: Snowy Mountain Brewery
description:
The Snowy Mountain Brewery is located in beautiful Saratoga, Wyoming and is the anchor brewpub for the Saratoga Resort and Spa.  The Saratoga Resort and Spa consistently draws people from all over Colorado and Wyoming due to its unique offering of a variety of amenities in one location--such as an on-site brewery, mineral hot spring pools, great food, western-styled rooms, jeep, ATV and snowmobile rentals, a golf course and a full-service spa.  

The Snowy Mountain Brewery is gaining in exposure and was featured recently in Travel Pulse’s “5 Unique Beer Vacation Spots in the U.S.!”  The name Snowy Mountain is fitting for the brewery as it sits adjacent the majestic Snowy Range Mountains, in southern Wyoming. Boasting 8-10 different craft beers throughout each season, the Snowy Mountain Brewery is one of the fastest growing breweries in Wyoming and surrounding states. The famous brewpub, with a throw-back to the wild west, is adorned with big game mounts and bar-stools made with six-shooters and patinated saddles and features a full pub menu with selections that compliment Saratoga's finest craft beers.

locations.name: Snowy Mountain Pub & Brewery

name: Stewart's Brewing Company
description:
Established in 1995, we are New Castle County's 1st brewpub.

It has always been our goal to provide the best handcrafted beer, fresh food & impeccable service.

locations.name: Main Brewery
locations.hoursOfOperation: Open every day from 11:00am-1:00am

name: The Brew Kettle, Taproom and Smokehouse
description: The BREW Kettle opened its doors in the fall of 1995 as Ohio's First Brew-On-Premise Microbrewery.  From that first day it has been our goal to provide our customers with the guidance, equipment and the freshest ingredients to produce quality, hand-crafted beers in an environment that is professional, safe and fun.  Fourteen years and 35,000 batches later, we are still committed to our customers' needs and desires. We invite you to visit our brewery to have a "look-see", visit with our expert brewing staff, or try brewing a batch from our "tried-and-true" recipe list.  we guarantee you'll be hooked!

name: Third Street Aleworks Restaurant & Brewery
description: The Third Street AleWorks’ philosophy about beer and brewing is simple – use the best ingredients possible; never cut corners; and keep it fresh!

name: Vierling Restaurant & Marquette Harbor Brewery
description: In December 1995, the Vierling became one of Michigan’s first brew pubs with the addition of a five barrel micro-brewing system.  The brew equipment, direct from Budapest, Hungary is configured to produce some of the finest ales and lagers in 155 gallon hand-crafted batches.  The relatively small sized batches of beer insures a fast product turn-over which enables the Vierling to serve the freshest beer possible with a multitude of varieties.

name: Vine Park Brewing Company
description:
The fun place to brew your own beer and make your wines!

The only place in the Midwest where you and friends, co-workers, or even family can meet to create your custom beers & wines. We provide the equipment, supplies, recipes, and expert Brew Coaches to assist you. You get the fun & the beverage. We take care of the mess & expertise.

name: Weyerbacher Brewing Company
description:
Established in 1995, Weyerbacher Brewing Company, Inc. was founded in the historic city of Easton, Pennsylvania. We bring artistry, mischief and adventure to the world of brewing so every Weyerbacher beer is an incredible experience.

We, the brewers of Weyerbacher, are continually pushing the envelope of taste experiences, obliterating style guidelines and having a blast while we're at it! Cheers!

name: Woodstock Inn Station & Brewery
description:
The Woodstock Inn opened in 1982.

The Woodstock Inn Brewery began brewing beer in 1995 on a 7 barrel system. We started as a Brew Pub with 8 different beers. As demand for our beers grew we added a 30 barrel production facility in 2012. We have two breweries on our property. The seven barrel brewery brews for our restaurant and does limited releases. The 30 barrel does all of our production and bottling. We do Brewery Tours every day at noon, seven days a week. There is a $5.00 charge, a pint glass a tasting is included. We also have a cask ale always on in the Brew Pub.  
 
The Brewery is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, 7 days a week. We also have 33 well appointed guest rooms, we also have a function room for 165 for weddings and gatherings.  Please stop by for a visit.
